event.title: the last time on Thursday, March 26

data.event: Purdin, 71, drove the Springfield City Area Transit Villa Road route for the last time on Thursday, March 26, joined by his family.
He will retire effective today, march 31, after 35 years working for the Springfield Bus Co.
In summer, drivers kept the doors open to stay cool.
"Throughout the years, I met all kinds of people."
